name: Dental Care
description: Dental or oral health is concerned with your teeth, gums and mouth. The goal is to maintain the overall health of your mouth.

name: Diagnostic center
description: Diagnostic care includes tests ordered by a physician help diagnose or monitor your condition or disease.

name: Intensive Care Unit
description: Intensive care units (ICUs) are specialist hospital wards that provide treatment and monitoring for people who are very ill.

name: Operation Theater
description: An operating theater (also known as an operating room (OR)) is a facility within a hospital where surgical operations

name: Ambulance
description: Ambulance services are used to respond to medical emergencies by emergency medical services.

name: Pharmaceutical care
description: Pharmaceutical care is a practice in which the practitioner takes responsibility for a patient's drug-related needs.

name: Cardiology
description: Cardiology is the study and treatment of disorders of the heart and the blood vessels of human body.

name: Radiology
description: Radiology is the medical discipline that uses medical imaging to diagnose and treat diseases within the bodies humans.

name: Ophthalmology
description: Ophthalmologists are specialist eye doctors who diagnose, treat and monitor eye conditions with medication and surgery.
